All processing happens on your computer. No data is sent anywhere.

CAUTION:

This is not 'evidence' of large-language model use (nor is it evidence against it!). This is a measure of literally what it says: the occurance of words provided by the authors of this paper within the provided text. These words were a reflection of terminology commonly found AT TIME OF PUBLISHING in journal abstracts (June 2024).
